properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v1 v2 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is my desire
To honour You
Lord with all my heart
I worship You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All I have within me
I give you praise
All that I adore
Is in You.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord I give you my heart
I give You my soul
I live for You alone
Ev'ry breath that I take
Ev'ry moment I'm awake
Lord have Your way in me
